title: Engineering peptide-modified alginate-based bioinks with cell-adhesive properties for biofabrication
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13769-13786
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08394B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Emine Karakaya, Luisa Gleichauf, Lisa Schöbel, Ahmed Hassan, Anahita Ahmadi Soufivand, Joerg Tessmar, Silvia Budday, Aldo R. Boccaccini, Rainer Detsch
Alginate-based bioinks used for DoD approaches can be modified with specific peptide-containing components so that incorporated printed cells show significantly higher cell elongation ratios after 7 days (created with https://www.BioRender.com).
